Title: Relates to eligibility for classification as permanent total disability
Summary: Relates to eligibility for classification as permanent total disability; includes inability to perform the full range of sedentary work or approval for federal social security disability benefits as a result of a compensable accident or occupational disease as constituting permanent total disability.
LawCode: Amd ยง15, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to eligibility for classification as permanent total disability
